doc.title: Les rayons x
doc.plot: A professor is seen applying the X-ray to a patient. While the instrument is in operation the man's skeleton leaves his body and his clothes sink to the floor. The professor becomes frightened and hurriedly restores his patient to his normal state, and during a heated argument over the price to be paid, they engage in a scuffle, overturn the table on which the apparatus is placed and the tube exploding affords great excitement and surprises.
